content: Sterness of Stone is one of the main Key Items in Black Myth: Wukong's Yellow Wind Ridge area. It is a mandatory Key Item you will come across throughout the chapter, as you need it to progress towards the final boss: the Yellow Wind Sage.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Sterness_of_Stone.md', within the main section titled 'Sterness of Stone'.
The content is as follows:
Sterness of Stone is one of the main Key Items in Black Myth: Wukong's Yellow Wind Ridge area. It is a mandatory Key Item you will come across throughout the chapter, as you need it to progress towards the final boss: the Yellow Wind Sage.
